message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product that I think you'd really value. I'm asking for $140 for it. Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. Can you meet me in the middle?
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal. I can come down to $135. This is a fair price considering the value of the product to you. What do you say?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $125?
